post.author: jonathanm
post.title: HTMLPage class
post.content: The Sphinx Logic site is currently under development using Silverlight 2 beta 2. By the time its done 2.0 should be released. An issue with the Silverlight class HTMLWindow came up. So I emailed Scott Guthrie and Wilco Bauwer at Microsoft for some help. Even though HTMLWindow has a Navigate method defined, you must use HtmlPage.Window.Navigate(www.jonathanmoore.net); to get the link to work. This is in C# by the way. Thanks guys!  The code is in the Code Samples section.
